title: Schedule Page Loads
custom_preconds: Go to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule/
custom_steps: Verify the page returns a 200 response.
custom_expected: The page returns a 200 response.

title: Url Structure - Schedule Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN user goes to beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the page loads
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN user goes to beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the page loads
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule

title: Url Structure - Schedule Canonical Url
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the canonical url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Canonical Url
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the canonical url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule

title: Url Structure - Schedule Url Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user goes to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule/<date>
custom_steps: WHEN the page loads
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule/<date>

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Url Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user goes to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/<language>/schedule/<date>
custom_steps: WHEN the page loads
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/<language>/schedule/<date>

title: Url Structure - Schedule Page Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page title is "Baseball Schedule"

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Page Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page title is "Calendario de béisbol"

title: Url Structure - Schedule Page Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page description is "The official schedule of Major League Baseball including probable pitchers, Gameday, ticket and postseason information."

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Page Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page description is "El calendario oficial de Grandes Ligas incluyendo los lanzadores probables, Gameday, boletos e información de postemporada."

title: Url Structure - Schedule Hreflang EN Tag
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the href with hreflang="en" is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule

title: Url Structure - Schedule Hreflang ES Tag
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the href with hreflang="es" is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule

title: Url Structure - Schedule Hreflang x-default Tag
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the href with hreflang="x-default" is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Hreflang EN Tag
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the href with hreflang="en" is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule

title: Url Structure - Spanish Schedule Hreflang ES Tag
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the href with hreflang="es" is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule

title: Teams - Title Field Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at the title field above the card
custom_expected: THEN the date for that card is present

title: Teams - Spanish Title Field Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at the title field above the card
custom_expected: THEN the date for that card is present

title: Teams - Away Team At Home Team
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN the game displays Away (left) and Home (right) team names

title: Teams - Team Logo and Team Name Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in desktop
custom_expected: THEN the team logos and team names are present

title: Teams - Team Logo and Team Tricode Mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in mobile
custom_expected: THEN the team logos and team tricodes are present

title: Teams - Team Logo Links To Club Site
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN the team logo links to the club site

title: Teams - Team Name Links To Club Site
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN the team name links to the club site

title: Teams - Spanish Team Logo Links To Club Site
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN the team logo links to the spanish club site

title: Teams - Spanish Team Name Links To Club Site
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN the team name links to the spanish club site

title: Status/Results - Preview State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview state
custom_expected: THEN the game start time is displayed

title: Status/Results - Preview State Delayed Start
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview delayed start state
custom_expected: THEN the game start time is replaced with "Delayed Start"

title: Status/Results - Live State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live state
custom_expected: THEN the inning state is displayed (i.e. "Top 2", "Bot 4", "Mid 6", "End 7")

title: Status/Results - Live State Warmup
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live warmup state
custom_expected: THEN the inning state is replaced with "Warmup"

title: Status/Results - Live State Suspended
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live suspended state
custom_expected: THEN the inning state is replaced with "Suspended"

title: Status/Results - Live State Delayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live delayed state
custom_expected: THEN the inning state is replaced with "Delayed"

title: Status/Results - Final State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in final state
custom_expected: THEN the final state is displayed; Away Score, Home Score (i.e. "NYY 12, BOS 1")

title: Status/Results - Preview State Gameday Link Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview state
custom_expected: THEN the link structure is /gameday/<gamePK>/preview

title: Status/Results - Live State Gameday Link Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live state
custom_expected: THEN the link structure is /gameday/<gamePK>

title: Status/Results - Final State Gameday Link Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in final state
custom_expected: THEN the link structure is /gameday/<gamePK>/final/box

title: Status/Results - Due Up Mid Inning
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a game in the middle of an inning.
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the matchup section.
custom_expected: THEN they will see the next three batters due up.

title: Status/Results - Due Up End Inning
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a game in the end of an inning.
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the matchup section.
custom_expected: THEN they will see the next three batters due up.

title: Matchup - Player Name Links to Player Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN clicking a player name links to their player page

title: Matchup - Player Name Links to Spanish Player Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game
custom_expected: THEN clicking a player name links to their spanish player page

title: Matchup - Preview State Both Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview state with both probable pitchers announced
custom_expected: THEN both probable pitchers and their stats are shown (i.e. "Cole (10-1) vs. Snell (2-6)")

title: Matchup - Preview State Away Probable Pitcher
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview state with away team probable pitcher announced
custom_expected: THEN the away team probable pitcher and their stats are shown (i.e. "Cole (10-1) vs. TBD")

title: Matchup - Preview State Home Probable Pitcher
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview state with home team probable pitcher announced
custom_expected: THEN the home team probable pitcher and their stats are shown (i.e. "TBD vs. Snell (2-6)")

title: Matchup - Preview State No Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in preview state with no probable pitchers announced
custom_expected: THEN no matchup info is shown

title: Matchup - Live State Pitcher/Hitter Matchup
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live state
custom_expected: THEN the pitcher vs. batter matchup is shown (i.e. "P: Cole (3-2, 1.72 ERA) AB: Trout (1-4, .890 OPS)")

title: Matchup - Live State Warmup Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in live warmup state
custom_expected: THEN both probable pitchers and their stats are shown (i.e. "Cole (10-1) vs. Snell (2-6)")

title: Matchup - Final State Decisions Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in final state with a save
custom_expected: THEN the winning pitcher, losing pitcher, and pitcher with the save are shown (i.e. "W: Cole (11-1) L: Snell (2-7) S: Chapman (24)")

title: Matchup - Final State Decisions No Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game in final state without a save
custom_expected: THEN the winning pitcher and losing pitcher are shown (i.e. "W: Cole (11-1) L: Snell (2-7)")

title: Product Links - Ticket Link
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game with an available ticket link
custom_expected: THEN a ticket link is displayed

title: Product Links - MLB.TV Link Live Yellow
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a live game
custom_expected: THEN a yellow MLB.TV link is displayed

title: Product Links - MLB.TV Link Archived Grey
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at an archived game
custom_expected: THEN a grey MLB.TV link is displayed

title: Product Links - MLB.TV Link Live Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a live game
custom_expected: THEN the link structure is /tv/g{gamePk}

title: Product Links - MLB.TV Link Archived Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at an archived game
custom_expected: THEN the link structure is /tv/g{gamePk}

title: Product Links - YouTube Link Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a YouTube game in desktop
custom_expected: THEN the YouTube button is displayed

title: Product Links - YouTube Link Mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a YouTube game in mobile
custom_expected: THEN the YouTube button is displayed

title: Schedule Sort - Sort By Start Time
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a set of games for a given date
custom_expected: THEN all the games are sorted chronologically by start time

title: Empty State - No Games Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at days with no games
custom_expected: THEN the empty state message is displayed ("There are no games scheduled for the dates selected.")

title: Empty State - Spanish No Games Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at days with no games
custom_expected: THEN the empty state message is displayed ("No hay partidos programados para las fechas seleccionadas.")

title: Empty State - No Games For Some Days Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at some days with no games
custom_expected: THEN the empty state message is displayed ("There are no games scheduled for this date.")

title: Empty State - Spanish No Games For Some Days Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at some days with no games
custom_expected: THEN the empty state message is displayed ("No hay juegos programados para esta fecha.")

title: Empty State - Suspended Game Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game that is suspended
custom_expected: THEN a dash is displayed instead of game info

title: Empty State - Spanish Suspended Game Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game that is suspended
custom_expected: THEN a dash is displayed instead of game info

title: Empty State - Cancelled Game Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game that is cancelled
custom_expected: THEN a dash is displayed instead of game info

title: Empty State - Spanish Cancelled Game Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game that is cancelled
custom_expected: THEN a dash is displayed instead of game info

title: Empty State - Postponed Game Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game that is postponed
custom_expected: THEN a dash is displayed instead of game info

title: Empty State - Spanish Postponed Game Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the spanish schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at a game that is postponed
custom_expected: THEN a dash is displayed instead of game info

title: Personalization - Favorite Team Schedule Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule for any date on desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should have a star next to the favorite team name with games sorting normally (favorite team doesn't change sort order)

title: Personalization - Favorite Team Schedule Mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/schedule for any date on mobile view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should have a star next to the favorite team name with games sorting normally (favorite team doesn't change sort order)

title: Personalization - Spanish Favorite Team Schedule Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule for any date on desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should have a star next to the favorite team name with games sorting normally (favorite team doesn't change sort order)

title: Personalization - Spanish Favorite Team Schedule Mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/schedule for any date on mobile view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should have a star next to the favorite team name with games sorting normally (favorite team doesn't change sort order)
